entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain or drizzle this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Lake Erie in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
